name: DeviantArt - Block Horror & Macabre images
description: If you dislike DeviantArt's section on Horror and Macabre images, this will block their preview images while browsing categories and artist's galleries, leaving the DeviantArt logo and the submission's name.
additional_info: 1.0: Hides the preview images and each submission's comment-count and category listing, leaving only the DA logo and submission name.
